UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structure-activity Relationship Studies of Shortened Analogues of the Antimicrobial Peptide EeCentrocin 1 From the Sea Urchin Echinus Esculentus.
Literature.Author: Solstad RG, Johansen C, Stensvag K, Strom MB, Haug T

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Corynebacterium glutamicum ATCC 13032(MIC=0.8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 9144(MIC=50µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=6.3µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=6.3µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=25µM),Aureobasidium pullulans(MIC=50µM),Rhodotorula sp.(MIC=12.5µM)
